    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Prebivalstvo Angloamerike</string>
            <string language="en">Citizens of Anglo-America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bürger von Anglo-Amerika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Citoyens de l'Anglo-Amérique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cidadãos de Anglo-América</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cittadini dell'Anglo-America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολίτες της ανγλο-Αμερικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciudadanos de Anglo-Ame'rica</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenci spoznajo geografske značilnosti Angloamerike, spoznajo družbene razmere v S-Ameriki v odvisnosti od naravnih možnosti, oblikujejo stališče in vrednote, kot so spoštovanje drugih narodov in kultur, strpnost do drugačnosti, mednarodno sodelovanje, spoznajo potrebo po prizadevanju za uresničevanje svetovnega miru in ohranjanje naravne in kulturne dediščine.</string>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan on topic - geography and society of English speaking part of America - Anglo-America.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">družba</string>
            <string language="en">society</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">geografija</string>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">narod</string>
            <string language="en">nation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">angloamerika</string>
            <string language="en">anglo-america</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan auf Thema - Geographie und 
Gesellschaft des englischsprechenden Teils von Amerika - 
Anglo-Amerika.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon sur le sujet - géographie et 
société de région d'expression anglaise de l'Amérique - 
l'Anglo-Amérique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição no tópico - a geografia e a 
sociedade do discurso inglês parte de América - Anglo-América.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione sul soggetto - geografia e 
società della zona anglofona dell'America - l'Anglo-America.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος για το θέμα - γεωγραφία και κοινωνία
του αγγλόφωνου μέρους της Αμερικής - της ανγλο-Αμερικής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan de la lección en asunto - la geografía y 
la sociedad del discurso inglés parte de América - Anglo-Ame'rica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesellschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
